# ===================================
# Git Ignore for Finance Management System (Python + Tkinter + SQLite)
# ===================================

# Byte-compiled / cache files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual environments
venv/
.venv/
ENV/
env/

# SQLite database files (local data, donâ€™t push)
finance.db
*.sqlite
*.sqlite3
*.db

# CSV reports (generated exports)
*.csv

# Logs
*.log

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# IDE / Editor settings
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace

# Jupyter notebooks checkpoints (if ever used)
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# Backup / temp files
*.bak
*.swp
*.tmp

# Packaging (future distribution / PyInstaller / setuptools)
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
*.spec
